comment.body:
`cdn.stroeerdigitalgroup.de/metatag/live/` looks like ads/tracking script using in many German sites: https://publicwww.com/websites/%22cdn.stroeerdigitalgroup.de%2Fmetatag%22+depth%3Aall ?

Website: https://www.stroeer.de/werben-mit-stroeer/onlinewerbung/

I have checked and didn't see obvious breakages on some sites, but I'm not totally sure. It's also used as cookie notice script in some sites like https://www.bergfex.com/ but I don't see breakages when blocking it.

issue.title: www.iqiyi.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.iqiyi.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2F) ### Comment > 在https://www.iqiyi.com/封面右键元素里找到播放链接，如果AdGuard开启下面2项功就算把问题域名设为白名单世 > 不能解决问题 > 1,【"AdGuard URL跟踪过滤器 > 通过从URL中删除跟踪参数来增强隐私的过滤器。” > 2."Legitimate URL Shortener > 自动从URL中删除不必要的"$'和'&'值，使它们更容易从URL栏中复制并作为链接 > 粘贴到其他地方。已包含在Dandelion Sprout的防骚扰列表中。】" > 会导致爱奇艺视频网站不能正常打开。关闭AdGuārd打开元素里面复制的链接就正 > 常打开 > 这是我最喜欢的2个功希望能修复规则，同时网站也是最知名的视频网站 > > > > Find the playback link in the element.If AdGuard enables the > following two functions,even if the problem domain is > whitelisted,it cannot solve the problem > 1.AdGuard URL Tracking Filter > A privacy enhancing filter that removes tracking parameters > from URLs > 2.Legal URL Shorter > Automatically remove unnecessary '$and'&'values from > URLs,making them easier to copy from the URL bar and > paste as links elsewhere.Already included in Dandelion > Sprout's anti harassment list > It will cause the iQiyi video website to not open properly. > Close AdGuard and open the copied link in the element to > open it normally > These are my favorite 2 features that I hope can fix the rules. > and the website is also the most well-known video website ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/i6xv2xilvmgc0cww48kkcssws44g08ggu79dc5zg2g.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/3gtx5niuu0mcs8k0c4kwo4wgo40gcgw3o5jib8afd4.png?nc=1)

Hide your search queries,

issue.body:

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/201893#issuecomment-2764399412 Please make sure that the weather app is added into AdGuard for Windows's HTTPS filtering app list.

issue.title: csonline.nexon.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://csonline.nexon.com/Main/Index](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcsonline.nexon.com%2FMain%2FIndex) ### Comment > 앱가드를 실행중이면 게임 실행 프로그램이 작동하지 않습니다 ### Screenshots

comment.body: It seems that my laptop's GPU (NVIDIA RTX 4060) does not allow virtual OpenGL (virtio)
